channel.title: API on RILLA KHALED
channel.description: Recent content in API on RILLA KHALED

item.title: Machine Translation
item.description: Machine Translation Have you heard that apocryphal machine translation story in which the text "the spirit is willing but the flesh is weak" became, "the vodka is good but the meat is rotten"? Today's code sketch pays homage to that. Click on any of the words below to see what WordsAPI rustles up as a synonym (no substitutions made means WordsAPI had no synonyms to offer).

item.title: SpaceTime
item.description: Spacetime -- Where are we? During dinner the other day, our friend Jhave reminded us of the incredible difficulty of trying to retain in mind the idea that time is space. So consider the image a clock of sorts, that renders differently based on what time it is for you. Or where in the world you choose to be.
